channel.title: CVE Feed for Gallagher -- Command Centre Mobile Connect for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Gallagher -- Command Centre Mobile Connect for Android

item.title: CVE-2021-23162|2024-09-16T22:35:10.674Z -- gallagher -- command%20centre%20mobile%20connect%20for%20android
item.description: Improper validation of the cloud certificate chain in Mobile Connect allows man-in-the-middle attack to impersonate the legitimate Command Centre Server. This issue affects: Gallagher Command Centre Mobile Connect for Android 15 versions prior to 15.04.040; version 14 and prior versions.
